result.title: Welcome to codeforces!
result.content:
Hi all!

Due to technical issues that sometimes happen with a2oj.com, It will be better to host the contest directly on codeforces.com

You can find all contests by pressing on the contests button.

You will have to register for the contest before you can start solving the problems.

I will try to attach solutions to all problems after each contest if anyone wants to check it.

You can also have discussions here by commenting on these blog posts.

If you have any questions you can comment it here or ask on facebook

Good luck!
